title: Absolutely Horrid Lag Problems. East Coat.
body: I've had the worst f*cking lag since last monday. Like out of nowhere, nothing was even updated, I just started getting lag. It's driving me f*cking insane. I click accept to join the game, then it takes like 30 seconds+ to actually get into champion select. Then I don't get the lane I want and when I actually do, at 30 seconds in the champion select, it says error and boots me out. Im fucking done.
